resources.string: When open it, voice commands can be used directly. When closed, voice commands are disabled.
If it is changed, the interface and the voice interaction language is changed together.
AISpeech Lyra Intelligent Voice Driving System
Copyright Â© 2007-%s AISpeech All Rights Reserved

screen on, screen off, 
open the wifi, close the wifi, 
open the bluetooth, close the bluetooth, 
volume up, volume down, 
volume mute, unmute, 
turn up brightness, turn down brightness, 
brightness set to maximum, 
keep the brightness to a minimum, 
open mirror link, close mirror link, 
open CarPlay, close CarPlay, 
open the browser, close the browser, 
go back, back to Home

open the music, play music, close the music, 
open the radio, close the radio, 
open the video, play video, close the video, 
open the TV, close the TV, 
open EQ, close EQ, 
open the online music, close the online music, 
pause playback, continue playing, 
previous track, next track, 
turn in previous station, turn in next station, 
search forward, search back, 
search radio station, 
switch mode
turn on navigation, turn off navigation

open the air-conditioning, close the air-conditioning, 
turn up the temperature, turn down the temperature, 
keep the temperature to a minimum, 
set the temperature to the highest, 
increase the wind speed, decrease the wind speed, 
maximum wind speed, minimum wind speed, 
turn on ac switch, turn off ac switch, 
open inner circulation, close inner circulation, 
open the auxiliary, close the auxiliary, 
open DVR, close DVR, 
open left camera, open right camera, 
open front camera, open rear camera, 
open panorama
